mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply (comment_id, post_id, author_email, content, created_date, parent_comment_id) VALUES (seq_reply.nextval, #{post_id}, #{author_email}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{parent_comment_id, jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reply WHERE post_id = #{post_id} ORDER BY COALESCE(parent_comment_id, comment_id), comment_id ASC
